trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> that holds the content of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: 제공 된 <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> 의 콘텐츠를 보유 하는 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 문서.

trans-unit.source: An XpsDocument contains a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> that comprises one or more <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements.
trans-unit.target: XpsDocument 포함 한 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>하나 이상의 구성 되 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>요소.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> constructor is passed a reference to a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> for writing, storing, and reading the content elements of the document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A>생성자에 대 한 참조를 전달 되는 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>작성, 저장 및 문서 콘텐츠 요소를 읽을 대 한.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is created by using the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 비어 있는 새 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>사용 하 여 만든는 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A>생성자.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: An existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is opened by using the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 기존 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>를 사용 하 여 열 여 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> root is added to an empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>루트는 빈에 추가 됩니다 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>호출 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> elements with printer information and control can also be associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>, or on individual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> elements that are stored in the XpsDocument.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>프린터 정보 및 제어를 사용 하 여 요소와도 연결 될 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>, 또는 개별 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>및 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>XpsDocument에 저장 된 요소입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence></xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 자세한 내용은 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 는 XPS XML Paper Specification ()에서 다운로드할 수 있는 참조 [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> class with access to a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> and default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> 지정 된에 대 한 액세스를 사용 하 여 클래스 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> 및 기본 인터리브, 리소스 및 압축 옵션입니다.

trans-unit.source: The target [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] package for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 대상 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] 에 대 한 패키지는 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> class that is contained in a specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> with specified default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> 클래스에 지정 된에 포함 된 <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> with 기본 인터리브, 리소스 및 압축 옵션을 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 대상 패키지는 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The package compression option.
trans-unit.target: 패키지 압축 옵션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> class that is contained in a specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> file with default interleaving, resource, and compression options.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> 클래스에 지정 된에 포함 된 <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> 기본 인터리브, 리소스 및 압축 옵션으로는 파일입니다.

trans-unit.target: 패키지 압축 옵션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds a root <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref> to the package and returns a writer.
trans-unit.target: 루트 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"> </xref> 패키지에는 기록기를 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Although this class uses a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be a set (sequence) of one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 하나의 이름을 사용 하지는 않지만 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>하나의 (시퀀스) 집합일 수 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>또는 여러 문서.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] fixed-document sequence writer for this <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 이 고정 된 문서 순서 기록기 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds a thumbnail image to the package.
trans-unit.target: 패키지에 미리 보기 이미지를 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: The format of the image.
trans-unit.target: 이미지의 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: The newly added <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새로 추가 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Closes the XPS document <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: XPS 문서를 닫습니다 <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> was opened for write access, data buffers are written to the store and the physical document <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> is closed.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>버퍼가 저장소와 실제 문서에 기록 되는 데이터 쓰기 액세스용 열린 <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>닫힙니다.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: After Close has been called, no parts of the document can be accessed with this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> instance.
trans-unit.target: 이 없는 문서 부분을 액세스할 수 닫기를 호출 된 후 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>인스턴스.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: Gets the core <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties"></xref> of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: 핵심 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageProperties"> </xref> 의 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 문서.

trans-unit.source: The core properties of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref><xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 핵심 속성은 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter"></xref> for writing an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 만듭니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter"> </xref> 쓰기용는 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document to write.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 작성할 문서입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter"></xref> to use for writing the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter"> </xref> 쓰기 위해 사용 하 여 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 문서.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> and optionally, releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 사용 되는 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제는 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> 선택적으로 관리 되는 리소스를 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 public `Dispose()` 메서드 및 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`보호 된 호출 `Dispose(Boolean)` 메서드는 `disposing` 매개 변수 설정 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>호출 `Dispose` 와 `disposing` 로 설정 `false`합니다.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> references.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 `disposing` 매개 변수가 true 이면이 메서드는 관리 개체가 보유 하 고 있는 모든 리소스를 해제 합니다.이 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>참조.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드 호출에서 `Dispose()` 각 참조 된 개체의 메서드.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>관리 되는 관리 되지 않는 리소스만 해제 하려면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 만 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader"></xref> for reading the document.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader"> </xref> 문서를 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Although this class uses a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be a set (sequence) of one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 하나의 이름을 사용 하지는 않지만 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>하나의 (시퀀스) 집합일 수 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>또는 여러 문서.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader"></xref> for reading the document.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader"> </xref> 문서를 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the fixed-document sequence at the root of the package.
trans-unit.target: 패키지의 루트에서 고정 된 문서 시퀀스를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Although this class uses a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be a set (sequence) of one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 하나의 이름을 사용 하지는 않지만 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>하나의 (시퀀스) 집합일 수 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>또는 여러 문서.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref> of the package.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"> </xref> 패키지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package is readable.
trans-unit.target: 패키지를 읽을 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the package is readable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>패키지를 읽을 수 있는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package can be digitally signed.
trans-unit.target: 패키지를 디지털 서명할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the package can be signed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>패키지를 서명할 수 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the package is writable.
trans-unit.target: 패키지를 쓸 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the package is writable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>패키지를 쓸 수 있는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a signature from the package.
trans-unit.target: 패키지에서 서명을 삭제합니다.

trans-unit.source: The signature that is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 삭제 된 서명입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] signatures that are associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 가져옵니다 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] 패키지와 연결 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Signatures list identifies what parts are signed and whether the signatures are valid.
trans-unit.target: 서명 목록 부분 서명 되 고 서명이 유효한 지 여부를 식별 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"></xref> objects that represent the signatures that are associated with the package.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> 의 <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"> </xref> 패키지와 연결 된 서명을 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts with a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 X.509 인증서를 사용 하 여 패키지 파트의 컬렉션에 서명 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box appears that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader.
trans-unit.target: 경우 `certificate` 은 `null`, 사용자가 스마트 카드 판독기에서와 같은 설치 된 X.509 인증서를 선택할 수 있도록 대화 상자가 나타납니다.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
trans-unit.target: 각 파트에 서명 사용할 X.509 인증서 또는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 사용자가 설치 된 인증서를 선택할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>패키지에 인증서를 저장 하려면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate what dependent parts must be excluded from the signing.
trans-unit.target: 서명에서 제외 해야 하는 종속 파트를 나타내는 플래그입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"></xref> that contains information about the signature.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"> </xref> 서명에 대 한 정보가 들어 있는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts by using a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 X.509 인증서를 사용 하 여 패키지 파트의 컬렉션을 서명 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box appears that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader.
trans-unit.target: 경우 `certificate` 은 `null`, 사용자가 스마트 카드 판독기에서와 같은 설치 된 X.509 인증서를 선택할 수 있도록 대화 상자가 나타납니다.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
trans-unit.target: 각 파트에 서명 사용할 X.509 인증서 또는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 사용자가 설치 된 인증서를 선택할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>패키지에 인증서를 저장 하려면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate what dependent parts are excluded from the signing.
trans-unit.target: 서명에서 제외 되는 종속 파트를 나타내는 플래그입니다.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] to assign to the signature.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] 서명에 할당할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"></xref> that contains information about the signature.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"> </xref> 서명에 대 한 정보가 들어 있는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Signs a collection of package parts with a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 X.509 인증서를 사용 하 여 패키지 파트의 컬렉션에 서명 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box is presented that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader.
trans-unit.target: 경우 `certificate` 은 `null`, 사용자가 스마트 카드 판독기에서와 같은 설치 된 X.509 인증서를 선택할 수 있도록 대화 상자가 나타납니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> is thrown if `certificate` is `null` and no certificates are installed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>이 throw 됩니다 `certificate` 은 `null` 인증서를 설치 합니다.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
trans-unit.target: 각 파트에 서명 사용할 X.509 인증서 또는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 사용자가 설치 된 인증서를 선택할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>패키지에 인증서를 저장 하려면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate what dependent parts to exclude from the signing.
trans-unit.target: 서명에서 제외할 종속 파트를 나타내는 플래그입니다.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] to assign to the signature.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] 서명에 할당할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to verify that <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.IsSignable*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> before signing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>확인 하려면 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.IsSignable*>은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 서명 전에 그렇지 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.IsSignable*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"></xref> that contains information about the signature.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"> </xref> 서명에 대 한 정보가 들어 있는입니다.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 인프라 하며 사용자 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the type-safe <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Dispose*> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 형식이 안전한을 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Dispose*>메서드 대신.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] thumbnail image that is associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 문서와 연결 된 미리 보기 이미지입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"></xref> that represents the thumbnail image that is associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"> </xref> 문서와 연결 된 미리 보기 이미지를 나타내는입니다.
